description:
Internal NuGet package with business objects used by several ASP-WAF products
			Documentation available at https://firewallapi.asp-waf.com/?topic=html/N-Walter.BOM.htm
releaseNotes:
Major releases that add functionality other than optimization and minor bug fixing
      8 August 2023
      - Updare SDK framework to match security release on .net 6 and .net 7
      
      
      12 July 2023       
      - Update to SDK SP 6.0.412. and 7.0.306
      - Update package references
      
      
			14 June 2023
			- Update due to SDK Update 7.0.304, and 6.0.410
			
			5 May 2023
			- Update due to new Obfuscation tool update
			
			1 May 2023
			- update FirewallBlockReasons Enum.
			- Update stack overflow in IClock
			
			29 April 2023
			- Add IClock and IReplayClock to allow integration and replay tests
			
			
			12 April 2023
			- Update to a new .net 7.0.5 SDK release
			
			14 Mar 2023
			- Update NuGet package refferences

			22 Feb 2023
			- Axel Imani Release (Go live)

			15 February 2023
			- Update to .net 6.0.406  and 7.0.3

			11 January 2023
			- update to 7.0.2, 6.0.13 SDK and build tools for 17.4.4
			- An SP for .net 3.1 was not provided by Microsoft at this time, we recommend migration away from 3.1 asap

			15 December 2022
			- Add support for South Eastern Europe as a region
			- Update definition of north America to match wikipedia
			- Add support for Pacific

			14 December 2022
			- Update to .Net SDK 3.1.426, 6.0.404 and 7.0.101

			7 December 2022
			- re-enable support for .net standard 2.1

			21 November 2022
			- Update to integrate the .net 7.0 cypher package release
			- Update package references

			14 November 2022
			- Update NuGet Packages

			6 November 2022
			- Add support for .Net 7

			15 November 2022
			- Update NuGet package references


			1 October 2022
			- Update build with new SDK
			- Update code sign certificates

			14 September 2022
			- Update to include new package 6.0.X and Microsoft CVE-2022-38013

			02 September 2022
			- Please make sure to update servers using this packages due to a security bug in .net
			> System.Security.Cryptography.Xml      4.5.0      Moderate   https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2m65-m22p-9wjw
		      > System.Text.Encodings.Web             4.5.0      Critical   https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-ghhp-997w-qr28
			
			31 June 2022
			- Update duplicate country mapping in geo locations
			
			
			15 June 2022
			- Update to support .net 6.0.7 and 3.1.27
			- Update package references
			
			21 June 2022
			- Update package references
			
			4 May 2022
			- Update NuGet References and BOM Geo data
			
			11 April 2022
			- Improve ServiceInfo class update service capturing
			- Fix bug where Asian GEO regions are added instead of listed  
			
			26 March 2022
			- Extend Geo name space with new Geo class used by LookWhousTalking framework
			
			15 March 2022
			- update to 6.0.3
			
			5 March add base classes used by IDPS framework
			- Service discovery updates
			- Talking updates
			- Port detection updates
			
			10 January 2022
			- Add support for the democratic republic of Congo
			- Add support for the Bouvet Island
			- Add extension method Expand to GeoLoacation[] type			
			
			16 December 2021
			- Update to .Net SDK update 14 December for .NET CORE 3.1.416, and .NET 5.0.404 and 6.0.101
			
			7 December 2021
			- Update to new Cypher interface
			
			9 November 2021
			- Fix package dependency on vulnerable packages from Microsoft by upgrading vulnerable packages
			- Update Enums used by the firewall CSP for trusted resources 
			
			08 November 2021
			- Update to .Net NuGet packages .NET 6.0.0, .NET 5.0.403 and core 3.1.415 
			
			11 October 2021
			- CodeSign the binaries as well as the NuGet package for executing in a trust-platform

			6 October 2021
			- Add type to UserTypes

			1 October 2021
			- Add additional blocking reason for firewall rule engine to use


			19 September
			- Update NuGet packages release for .Net 5.0.10

			9 September 2021
			- Add Default implementation to ForCountry for interface to IMapLocation

			7 September 2021
			- Add flag types for abuse report support in firewall abstract base controller Walter.Web.FireWall.Administration.AbuseBaseController

			18 Aug 2021
			- Add unknown const to SimpleLatLong

			8 Aug 2021
			- update to .NET 6.0 SDK (v6.0.100-preview.6)
			- Add rules to firewall triggers


			30 June 2021
			- Add .Net 6.0 binaries to the NuGet package

			15 June 2021
			- Update to .Net Core 3.1.17 and .Net 5.0.8

			07 July 2021
			- Add audit class for firewall violations
			- Add helper method to convert the coordinates to degrees for Latitude and longitude

			24 June 2021
			- Update SimpleLatLong
			- Merge dependent DLL Walter and Walter.Cypher in Assembly

			19 June 2021
			- Alter geography extension methods reducing memory footprint

			12 June 2021
			- Add blacklist status objects

			09 June 2021
			- Update to .Net SDK 5.0.301 and 3.1.410

			- Add data types

			- Extend Enum's used by Walter.Networking and Walter.Web-FireWall

			- Add Event logging database errors

			12 April 2021
			- Update to new code base after .net security violation fix

			05 April 2021
			- Extend GEO classes
			- Update package references
			- Add support for .net standard 2.0

			04 April 2021
			- Extend GeoLocationMapping and add LocationMap dictionary with Lat/Long valued for all capital cities in all supported countries
			- Add support for DRC and Congo

			05 April 2021
			- Update business data objects
			- update package references

			22 March 2021
			- performance update

			15 March 2021
			- Update Enum types

			- Additional status codes

			- Framework extension changes
			- Update package references

			30 January 2021
			- Add AuditLog struct to library
			- update package references

			- Update extension methods
			- update package references

			02 January 2021
			- Updated terms and conditions to REL. 2021.01.02
			- Extend DIContainer and IServiceFactory classes
			- Extend GeoLocation to get country name using method GetCountryName()

			29 December 2020
			- Extend DI interface and Documentation interfaces


			23 December 2020

			- Remove support for Net48

			- Update IMapLocation add IP address

			- Compile with Language version 9.0

			2020.10.14

title: Business objects used by several ASP-WAF products
